This classic game builds upon the Original's first-person gameplay and storytelling, with many new technical improvements and innovations, thanks to the Source engine, with such a long shelf-life it is still being used today, more than a decade after being first introduced. Half-Life 2 takes a more cinematic approach than its predecessor, with a more fleshed-out story.

Ugh amazing game, can't wait for hl3

[h] Half-Life 2[/h]

Have you noticed how everytime a game developer publishes a game including storytelling like in Half-Life and it becomes so good that a continuation is desperatly needed, the game developers usually disappoint their fans or followers, or if not that, don't live up to their expectations? It happens most of the time. Well, Half-Life 2 is surely not one of those games.

The story is of course as marvelous as ever, but the aesthethic part of the game has been massively improved. And not only that, everything got better, now that is has the praised Source Engine. You'll encounter many new foes on your journey to acomplishing your goal and the puzzles are much better than before, some even utilise the new Source Engine physics mechanics in order to achieve completion. The fighting is epic, and flying enemies have become much more common and harder to kill.

[h] The Story [/h]

Now, if you're a fan of HL you should've heard at least a little bit of the whole controversy surrounding the story. For those that haven't, no, the story of the game is not complete. It's longer than that of HL1 but unfinished and I doubt that it will be finished anytime soon, if ever. But still, in the time the story spans, you'll be escaping from whole cities, drive though deserts, play with cranes(Yeah...) and much more.

[h] The Price [/h]

Since I'm not very good financialy, you won't be seeing me giving 10 Euroes to get the game. I'd much rather wait a sale and get HL2 along with Episode 1 and 2, which are seperate games.

Childhood

I am a gaming veteran of 30 plus years, especially FPS games and in 2018 i decided to get half life 2(for some reason i had never been interested in this...BIG Mistake).

Well: This game is FANTASTIC, it is challenging, fast, makes you think with problems to solve, excellent Ai, Brilliant gun play, very diverse and extremely immersive., it is everything a solid shooter should be. It is a Must have for any fps player new or old.

game runs on source engine, so it it fairly easy to run at max settings and 60+ fps on most machines. 

all i can say is.... this game has proved to me how backwards modern fps games have gone from this, they really need to take a leaf from this game and expand on it, as this should be the minimum platform for modern shooters to grow from, yes!!! it is really that good. the only complaint i had(minor) is that you can't ADS all weapons, but after an hour or so this becomes irrelevant and the game shines. for me this game rates up there with ...F.E.A.R (9/10), crysis 1 (9/10) and doom (9/10). i think half life 2 is questionably better but all worth a play.

10/10 in my opinion its a MUST have.

Half life 2 now supports game controllers aswell, so if your stuck in (console mode) then you can be happy knowing you are catered for aswell. :-)
